languages.text: "Вы говорите это сейчас, но на месте Тисифоны... Смогли бы отказаться от такого шанса? Вы не можете знать. Я прекрасно вижу цвета вашей души, и в ней хватает темный оттенков".

traits.locale_text: "Вы говорите это сечас, но на месте Тисифоны... Смогли бы откзаться от такого шанса? Вы не можете знать. Я прекрасно вижу цвета вашей души, и в ней хватает темный оттенков".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "You say so now, but had you been in Tisiphone's shoes... would you have passed up a chance like that? You cannot know for certain. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."
languages.original_text: "Вы говорите это сейчас, но на месте Тисифоны... Смогли бы отказаться от такого шанса? Вы не можете знать. Я прекрасно вижу цвета вашей души, и в ней хватает темный оттенков".

traits.locale_text: "You say so now, but if it had been you in Tisiphone's place... would you have passed up a chance like that? You cannot know for certain. I can see your soul's colours well, and there are plenty of darker shades within."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You say so now, but if it had been you in Tisiphone's place... would you have passed up a chance like that? You cannot know for certain. I can see your soul's colours well, and there are plenty of darker shades within."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You say so now, but had you been in Tisiphone's shoes... would you have passed up a chance like that? You cannot know for certain. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You say so now, but had you been in Tisiphone's shoes... would you have passed up a chance like that? You cannot know for certain. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You say so now, but had you been in Tisiphone's shoes... would you have passed up a chance like that? You cannot know for certain. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You say so now, but had you been in Tisiphone's shoes... would you have passed up a chance like that? You cannot know for certain. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「今はそう仰いますが、ティシフォンと同じ立場だったなら…あんな機会をみすみす逃しますか？断言できませんよね。{name}様の魂の色が嫌と言うほど見えますよ。影よりも暗い色をたっぷり内に秘めています」
languages.original_text: "You say so now, but had you been in Tisiphone's shoes... would you have passed up a chance like that? You cannot know for certain. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."

traits.locale_text: 「今はそう仰いますが、ティシフォンと同じ立場だったなら…あんな機会をみすみす逃しますか？断言できませんよね。{name}様の魂の色が嫌と言うほど見えますよ。影よりも暗い色をたっぷり内に秘めています」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你现在自然可以这么说。可如果换做是你，站在提西福涅的立场上……你真的会放弃那样的机会吗？你无法确定，因为我已经看穿了你灵魂的色彩，你的灵魂也不乏阴暗的部分。”
languages.original_text: "You say so now, but had you been in Tisiphone's shoes... would you have passed up a chance like that? You cannot know for certain. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."

traits.locale_text: “你现在自然可以这么说。可如果换做是你，站在提西福涅的立场上……你真的会放弃那样的机会吗？你无法确定，因为我已经看穿了你灵魂的色彩，你的灵魂也不乏阴暗的部分。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous pouvez toujours vous en convaincre, mais si vous aviez été à la place de Tisiphone... auriez-vous vraiment laissé passer une chance pareille ? Nul ne peut le dire. Je peux voir les teintes de votre âme, et certaines sont bien plus sombres qu'elles ne le devraient. »
languages.original_text: "You say so now, but had you been in Tisiphone's shoes... would you have passed up a chance like that? You cannot know for certain. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pouvez toujours vous en convaincre, mais si vous aviez été à la place de Tisiphone... auriez-vous vraiment laissé passer une chance pareille ? Nul ne peut le dire. Je peux voir les teintes de votre âme, et certaines sont bien plus sombres qu'elles ne le devraient. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Eso dice ahora, pero, de haber estado en el lugar de Tisiphone... ¿habría rechazado una oportunidad como esa? No hay forma de saberlo. Veo perfectamente los colores de su alma y sé que está plagada de sombras».
languages.original_text: "You say so now, but had you been in Tisiphone's shoes... would you have passed up a chance like that? You cannot know for certain. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."

traits.locale_text: «Eso dice ahora, pero, de haber estado en el lugar de Tisiphone... ¿habría rechazado una oportunidad como esa? No hay forma de saberlo. Veo perfectamente los colores de su alma y sé que está plagada de sombras».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Das sagt Ihr jetzt, doch wäret Ihr an Tisiphones Stelle gewesen ... hättet Ihr Euch eine solche Gelegenheit entgehen lassen? Ihr könnt es nicht mit Gewissheit sagen. Ihr kann die Farben Eurer Seele sehr gut sehen, und sie trägt reichlich dunkle Töne in sich."
languages.original_text: "You say so now, but had you been in Tisiphone's shoes... would you have passed up a chance like that? You cannot know for certain. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."

traits.locale_text: "Das sagt Ihr jetzt, doch wäret Ihr an Tisiphones Stelle gewesen ... hättet Ihr Euch eine solche Gelegenheit entgehen lassen? Ihr könnt es nicht mit Gewissheit sagen. Ihr kann die Farben Eurer Seele sehr gut sehen, und sie trägt reichlich dunkle Töne in sich."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Hâl böyleyken demesi kolay. Ya Tisiphone'nin yerinde olsaydın? O zaman böyle bir fırsatı teper miydin? Asla emin olamazsın. Ruhunun renklerini gayet iyi görebiliyorum. Ruhun pek çok karanlık renk barındırıyor."
languages.original_text: "You say so now, but had you been in Tisiphone's shoes... would you have passed up a chance like that? You cannot know for certain. I can see your soul's colours all too well and there are plenty of darker shades within."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi böyle demesi kolay. Ya Tisiphone'nin yerinde olsaydın? O zaman böyle bir fırsatı teper miydin? Bundan emin olman mümkün değil. Ruhunun renklerini gayet iyi görebiliyorum. Ruhunda pek çok karanlık renk barındırıyorsun."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
